name: react-project
description: Welcome to the Color Palette Generator! This simple web application allows you to create a beautiful color palette based on a color of your choice. You can either enter a specific color code or use the color picker to select a color. When you hit the "Generate Color Palette" button, we will create 10 shades both higher and lower than your chosen color to give you a diverse palette for your creative projects.
author: "Ankita Budhia"
